Name: Aquila Favonia no proc
Note: ATK is increased by 20~40%. Triggers on taking DMG: the soul of the Falcon of the West awakens, holding the banner of the resistance aloft, regenerating HP equal to 100~160% of ATK and dealing 200~320% of ATK as DMG to surrounding opponents. This effect can only occur once every 15s. [We ignore the effect that happens once every 15s].

Name: Mistsplitter Reforged
Note: Gain a 12%~24% Elemental DMG Bonus for every element and receive the might of Mistsplitter's Emblem. At stack levels 1/2/3, Mistsplitter's Emblem provides a 8/16/28%~16/32/56% Elemental DMG Bonus for the character's Elemental Type. The character will obtain 1 stack of Mistsplitter's Emblem in each of the following scenarios: Normal Attack deals Elemental DMG (stack lasts 5s), casting Elemental Burst (stack lasts 10s); Energy is less than 100% (stack disappears when Energy is full). Each stack's duration is calculated independently.

Name: Mistsplitter Reforged 1 stack
Note: Gain a 12%~24% Elemental DMG Bonus for every element and receive the might of Mistsplitter's Emblem. At stack levels 1/2/3, Mistsplitter's Emblem provides a 8/16/28%~16/32/56% Elemental DMG Bonus for the character's Elemental Type. The character will obtain 1 stack of Mistsplitter's Emblem in each of the following scenarios: Normal Attack deals Elemental DMG (stack lasts 5s), casting Elemental Burst (stack lasts 10s); Energy is less than 100% (stack disappears when Energy is full). Each stack's duration is calculated independently.

Note: Gain a 12%~24% Elemental DMG Bonus for every element and receive the might of Mistsplitter's Emblem. At stack levels 1/2/3, Mistsplitter's Emblem provides a 8/16/28%~16/32/56% Elemental DMG Bonus for the character's Elemental Type. The character will obtain 1 stack of Mistsplitter's Emblem in each of the following scenarios: Normal Attack deals Elemental DMG (stack lasts 5s), casting Elemental Burst (stack lasts 10s); Energy is less than 100% (stack disappears when Energy is full). Each stack's duration is calculated independently.

Note: Gain a 12%~24% Elemental DMG Bonus for every element and receive the might of Mistsplitter's Emblem. At stack levels 1/2/3, Mistsplitter's Emblem provides a 8/16/28%~16/32/56% Elemental DMG Bonus for the character's Elemental Type. The character will obtain 1 stack of Mistsplitter's Emblem in each of the following scenarios: Normal Attack deals Elemental DMG (stack lasts 5s), casting Elemental Burst (stack lasts 10s); Energy is less than 100% (stack disappears when Energy is full). Name: The Alley Flash no active
Note: Increases DMG dealt by the character equipping this weapon by 12~24%. Taking DMG disables this effect for 5s.

Name: The Alley Flash with active
Note: Increases DMG dealt by the character equipping this weapon by 12~24%. Taking DMG disables this effect for 5s.

Name: Summit Shaper 0 stack
Note: Increases Shield Strength by 20~40%. Scoring hits on opponents increases ATK by 4~8% for 8s. Max 5 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s. While protected by a shield, this ATK increase effect is increased by 100%.

Name: Summit Shaper 5 stacks
Note: Increases Shield Strength by 20~40%. Scoring hits on opponents increases ATK by 4~8% for 8s. Max 5 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s. While protected by a shield, this ATK increase effect is increased by 100%.

Name: Summit Shaper 5 stacks with shield
Note: Increases Shield Strength by 20~40%. Scoring hits on opponents increases ATK by 4~8% for 8s. Max 5 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s. While protected by a shield, this ATK increase effect is increased by 100%.

Name: Skyward Blade no proc
Note: Crit Rate increased by 4~8%. Gains Skypiercing Might upon using Elemental Burst: Increases Movement SPD by 10%, increases ATK SPD by 10%, and Normal and Charged hits deal additional DMG equal to 20~40% of ATK. Skypiercing Might lasts for 12s.

Name: Skyward Blade with proc
Note: Crit Rate increased by 4~8%. Gains Skypiercing Might upon using Elemental Burst: Increases Movement SPD by 10%, increases ATK SPD by 10%, and Normal and Charged hits deal additional DMG equal to 20~40% of ATK. Skypiercing Might lasts for 12s.

Name: Blackcliff Longsword 0 stack
Note: After defeating an opponent, ATK is increased by 12~24% for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.

Name: Blackcliff Longsword 3 stacks
Note: After defeating an opponent, ATK is increased by 12~24% for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.

Name: Prototype Rancour 0 stack
Note: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks increase ATK and DEF by 4~8% for 6s. Max 4 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s.

Name: Prototype Rancour 4 stacks
Note: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks increase ATK and DEF by 4~8% for 6s. Max 4 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s.

Name: Primordial Jade Cutter
Note: HP increased by 20~40%. Additionally, provides an ATK Bonus based on 1.2~2.4% of the wielder's Max HP. [We assume that Kaeya's Max HP = 10830*(1+20%)+4780 at R1. And the flat ATK increase per refinement is caliberated between R1 and R5, its value is slightly inaccurate for R2, R3 and R4].

Name: Iron Sting 0 stack
Note: Dealing Elemental DMG increases all DMG by 6~12% for 6s. Max 2 stacks. Can only occur once every 1s.

Name: Iron Sting 2 stacks
Note: Dealing Elemental DMG increases all DMG by 6~12% for 6s. Max 2 stacks. Can only occur once every 1s.

Name: Lion's Roar no active
Note: Increases DMG against enemies affected by Pyro or Electro by 20~36%.

Name: Lion's Roar with active
Note: Increases DMG against enemies affected by Pyro or Electro by 20~36%.

Name: Royal Longsword
Note: Upon dealing damage to an opponent, increases CRIT Rate by 8~16%. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT hit removes all existing stacks. [We ignore the active of this weapon].

Name: The Flute
Note: Normal or Charged Attacks grant a Harmonic on hits. Gaining 5 Harmonics triggers the power of music and deals 100~200% ATK DMG to surrounding enemies. Harmonics last up to 30s, and a maximum of 1 can be gained every 0.5s. [We ignore the active of this weapon].

Name: Festering Desire
Note: Increases Elemental Skill DMG by 16~32% and Elemental Skill CRIT Rate by 6~12%.

Name: The Black Sword
Note: Increases DMG dealt by Normal and Charged Attacks by 20~40%. Additionally, regenerates 60~100% of ATK as HP when Normal and Charged Attacks score a CRIT Hit. This effect can occur once every 5s.

Name: Favonius Sword
Note: CRIT hits have a 60~100% chance to generate a small amount of Elemental Particles, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every 12~6s. [We ignore the energy particle effect].

Name: Sacrificial Sword
Note: After dealing damage to an opponent with an Elemental Skill, the skill has a 40~80% chance to end its own CD. Can only occur once every 30~16s. [We ignore the active of this weapon].

Name: Traveler's Handy Sword
Note: Each Elemental Orb or Particle collected restores 1~2% HP.

Name: Sword of Descension
Note: Hitting enemies with Normal or Charged Attacks grants a 50% chance to deal 200% ATK as DMG in a small AoE. This effect can only occur once every 10s. Additionally, if the Traveler equips the Sword of Descension, their ATK is increased by 66. [We ignore the active of this weapon].

Name: Cool Steel no active
Note: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Hydro or Cryo by 12~24%.

Name: Cool Steel with active
Note: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Hydro or Cryo by 12~24%.

Name: Dark Iron Sword no proc
Note: Upon causing an Overloaded, Superconduct, Electro-Charged, or an Electro-infused Swirl reaction, ATK is increased by 20~40% for 12s.

Name: Dark Iron Sword with proc
Note: Upon causing an Overloaded, Superconduct, Electro-Charged, or an Electro-infused Swirl reaction, ATK is increased by 20~40% for 12s.

Name: Harbinger of Dawn no active
Note: When HP is above 90%, increases CRIT Rate by 14~28%.

Name: Harbinger of Dawn with active
Note: When HP is above 90%, increases CRIT Rate by 14~28%.

Name: Fillet Blade
Note: On hit, has 50% chance to deal 240~400% ATK DMG to a single enemy. Can only occur once every 15~11s. [We ignore the active of this weapon].

Name: Skyrider Sword no proc
Note: Using an Elemental Burst grants a 12~24% increase in ATK and Movement SPD for 15s.

Name: Skyrider Sword with proc
Note: Using an Elemental Burst grants a 12~24% increase in ATK and Movement SPD for 15s.

Note: None
